Feat.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, spells cast twice as fast and cannot be interrupted by enemy attacks, but they consume 10 additional spell points.

Stance.Name: Quicken
Stance.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, spells cast twice as fast and cannot be interrupted by enemy attacks, but they consume 10 additional spell points.

Feat.Name: Quivering Palm
Feat.Description: The monk delivers a fatal attack by sending waves of vibrations through the target with a weapon strike. The attack costs 30 Ki, and if it hits the victim must pass a Fortitude save (DC 10 + monk level/2 + Wisdom modifier + QP modifiers) or die. Quivering Palm gains DC bonuses from general tactical combat boosts, but not Sundering items. Whenever an enemy saves vs. Quivering Palm, you get a stacking +4 bonus to your Quivering Palm DC. This stack is dispelled when you successfully kill someone with Quivering Palm (or 3 minutes pass). This ability emulates other death spells, so deathblock or death ward both grant immunity. Using Quivering Palm will drop you out of Sneak and remove any Invisibility effects.

DC.Name: Quivering Palm
DC.Description: The monk delivers a fatal attack by sending waves of vibrations through the target with a weapon strike. The attack costs 30 Ki, and if it hits the victim must pass a Fortitude save or die.

Feat.Name: Racial Spell Resistance
Feat.Description: You are naturally resistance to spells and magical effects. You have a base Spell Resistance of 6, protecting you from many non-damaging spells and effects.

Feat.Name: Rage
Feat.Description: Activate this barbarian ability to enter a bloodthirsty frenzy, granting you a +4 bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +2 Morale bonus to Will saves and a -2 penalty to AC. When the rage ends, however, you will lose the hit points granted to you by increased Constitution and become fatigued. Your rage will list for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your constitution. You can prematurely end your rage by using the Dismiss Rage feat.

Stance.Name: Rage
Stance.Description: Enter a bloodthirsty frenzy, granting you a +4 bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +2 Morale bonus to Will saves and a -2 penalty to AC.

Feat.Name: Rapid Reload
Feat.Description: Allows Crossbows to be reloaded about 20% faster.

Feat.Name: Rapid Shot
Feat.Description: You can make ranged attacks about 20% faster and reload faster when using a ranged weapon.

Feat.Name: Remove Disease
Feat.Description: Activate this paladin ability to cure one or more diseases in your target.

Feat.Name: Resilience
Feat.Description: You gain a +4 to all saving throws. Spells have three times their normal cooldown when this mode is active.

Stance.Name: Resilience
Stance.Description: You gain a +4 to all saving throws. Spells have three times their normal cooldown when this mode is active.

Feat.Name: Resist Poison
Feat.Description: Grants a +4 bonus to all saving throws versus Poison.

Feat.Name: Retain Essence
Feat.Description: When you use a rod, staff, or wand, you have a (Artificer Level + Intelligence Modifier)% chance not to expend a charge.

Feat.Name: Revive Iron Defender
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to revive your Iron Defender companion once per rest.

Feat.Name: Sap
Feat.Description:
Tactical Melee Attack: When activated, a melee special attack is made. If it hits, the victim is dazed for 18 seconds normally or 30 seconds from a successful sneak attack. (Whether or not your character can normally perform sneak attacks) or until they are damaged. Unlike Trip and Stunning Blow, no save is made against this effect
Creatures who cannot be sneak attacked will not be affected.

Feat.Name: Self Sufficient
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to the character's Heal and Repair skills.

Feat.Name: Shield Deflection
Feat.Description: When actively blocking with any type of Shield you are proficient with, you gain a Competence bonus based on the type of shield to completely ignore Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage. Buckler: 20%, Small Shield: 25%, Large Shield 30%, Tower Shield: 40%

Feat.Name: Shield Mastery
Feat.Description: You are skilled with the use of a shield and your physical resistance is increased by 3 when using a buckler or small shield, 5 when using a large shield, or 10 when using a tower shield. You gain 3% double strike while using a shield. Add +3 Melee Power

Feat.Name: Shield Proficiency (General)
Feat.Description: This feat negates the penalties from using bucklers, small and Large Shields.

Feat.Name: Shining Star
Feat.Description: You use the combined power of Earth, Wind and Fire to set up harmonic vibrations within your enemy that force them to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Charisma mod).

DC.Name: Shining Star
DC.Description: You use the combined power of Earth, Wind and Fire to set up harmonic vibrations within your enemy that force them to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Shot on the Run
Feat.Description: Negates the penalty to your attack roll for firing ranged weapon while moving. Also gives +3 ranged power.

Feat.Name: Single Weapon Fighting
Feat.Description: While Single Weapon Fighting, you gain +10% Combat Style bonus to attack speed and 2 Melee Power. Requires fighting with a single one-handed weapon, and wielding only an orb, runearm, or nothing in your off hand.

Feat.Name: Shuriken Expertise
Feat.Description: You are skilled with the use of the shuriken and have a chance to throw an additional one per throw. (Percent chance to throw an additional shuriken is equal to your Dexterity.)

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Club
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a club.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Dagger
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a dagger.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Dart
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a dart.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Heavy Crossbow
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a heavy crossbow.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Heavy Mace
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a heavy mace.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Light Crossbow
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a light corssbow.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Light Mace
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a light mace.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Morningstar
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a morningstar.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Quarterstaff
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a quarterstaff.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Sickle
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a sickle.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Throwing Dagger
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a throwing dagger.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Unarmed
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using unarmed attacks, or when attacking from an animal form.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Balance
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Balance skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Bluff
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Bluff skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Concentration
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Concentration skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Diplomacy
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Diplomacy skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Disable Device
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Disable Device skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Haggle
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Haggle skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Heal
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Heal skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Hide
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Hide skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Intimidate
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Intimidate skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Jump
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Jump skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Listen
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Listen skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Move Silently
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Move Silently skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Open Lock
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Open Lock skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Perform
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Perform skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Repair
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Repair skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Search
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Search skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Spell Craft
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Spell Craft checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Spot
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Spot skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Swim
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Swim skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Tumble
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Tumble skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Use Magic Device
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Use Magic Device skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Mastery
Feat.Description: This ability gains +1 to all skills. A rogue may take this ability multiple times.

Feat.Name: Slicing Blow
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you deal 1 point of Constitution damage to your target and deal 1 to 4 additional damage 2 seconds later as the target bleeds. The target suffers an additional round of bleeding for every 3 characters levels, up to a max of 6 at level 15. Unlike Trip and Stunning Blow, no save is made against this effect. Cooldown 15 seconds. Some creatures may be immune to the bleeding or wounding effect.

Feat.Name: Slippery Mind
Feat.Description: Grants the rogue a second chance to avoid harmful enchantments. Upon failure of a Will Save vs. Enchantments, the rogue immediately receives a second attempt at the saving throw.

Feat.Name: Slow Fall
Feat.Description: Your focus allows you to bend nature around you to make gravity have less effect. This is an active feat and can be turned off should you desire normal gravity to affect you.

Feat.Name: Small Size Bonus
Feat.Description: As a Small creature, you receive a +1 size bonus to attack rolls and Armor Class and a +4 bonus on Hide checks. -4 penalty to Intimidate.

Feat.Name: Smite Evil
Feat.Description: Using this attack, you call on the paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your Paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

Feat.Name: Snake Blood
Feat.Description: Grants a +1 bonus on Reflex saves and +2 bonus to saving throws versus Poison.

Feat.Name: Sneak
Feat.Description: The character becomes invisible to all enemies that fail a Spot and Listen skill check, opposed by Hide and Move Silently skills.

Feat.Name: Sneak Attack
Feat.Description: Allows you to deal additional damage when a monster is unaware of your presence or targeting another character.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Abjuration
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Abjuration school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Conjuration
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Conjuration school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Enchantment
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Enchantment school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Evocation
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Evocation school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Illusion
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Illusion school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Necromancy
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Necromancy school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Transmutation
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Transmutation school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Penetration
Feat.Description: Adds +2 to your caster level check for defeating spell resistance.

Feat.Name: Spell Save Bonus
Feat.Description: Your race are naturally resistant to spells, receiving a +2 bonus to saves against spell effects.

Feat.Name: Spring Attack
Feat.Description: You suffer no penalty to your attack roll when moving and attacking. You will also gain a 2% Dodge bonus.

Feat.Name: Stealthy
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to the character's Hide and Move Silently skills.

Feat.Name: Still Mind
Feat.Description: Your training and meditation improve your resistance to mind-affecting attacks, granting you a +2 bonus on saves against enchantments.

Feat.Name: Storm Strike I
Feat.Description: You strike an opponent, backed with the power of lightning. Your attack will deal 1 to 6 additional lightning damage (D&D Dice: 1d6).

Feat.Name: Strike of the Enduring I
Feat.Description: You strike an opponent, backed with the strength of the earth. Your attack deals 4 additional damage.

Feat.Name: Stunning Blow
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you may stun the target for a few seconds. Some creatures may be immune to the stun effect. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + Str mod + Stun bonuses)

DC.Name: Stunning Blow
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you may stun the target for a few seconds. Some creatures may be immune to the stun effect. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Stunning Fist
Feat.Description: A swift unarmed attack to vulnerable areas that cause your target to be stunned for 6 seconds if it fails a Fortitude save. DC = 10 + half character levels + Wis mod + other modifiers

DC.Name: Stunning Fist
DC.Description: A swift unarmed attack to vulnerable areas that cause your target to be stunned for 6 seconds if it fails a Fortitude save.

Feat.Name: Sunder
Feat.Description: This melee special attack, when successful, results in a -4 AC penalty to the target for 12 seconds if it fails a Fortitude save. DC 10 + Str mod + sunder modifiers. Some creatures may be immune to the sunder effect

DC.Name: Sunder
DC.Description: This melee special attack, when successful, results in a -4 AC penalty to the target for 12 seconds if it fails a Fortitude save.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Bludgeoning Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a bludgeoning weapon, including attacks from a druid in animal form and an additional +2 stacking Melee Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Piercing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a piercing weapon and an additional +2 stacking Melee Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Ranged Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a ranged weapon. and an additional +2 stacking Ranged Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Slashing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a slashing weapon. and an additional +2 stacking Melee Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Thrown Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a thrown weapon. and an additional +2 stacking Ranged Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Tactical Combatant
Feat.Description: +4 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Tactical Mastery
Feat.Description: +6 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Tactical Supremacy
Feat.Description: +8 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Tactical Training
Feat.Description: +2 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Ten Thousand Stars
Feat.Description: For the next 30 seconds, add your Wisdom ability score to your Ranged Power and add your Monk level * 5 to your Doubleshot. This ability puts Manyshot on a 30 second cooldown. Cooldown: one minute.

Feat.Name: The Gathering Storm
Feat.Description: Air:Air:Air Finisher - Winds gather about your enemy, decreasing your opponent's chance to land attacks. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod)

DC.Name: The Gathering Storm
DC.Description: Winds gather about your enemy, decreasing your opponent's chance to land attacks. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect.

Feat.Name: The Raging Sea
Feat.Description: Water:Water:Water Finisher - Like a swimmer fighting against the raging sea, your enemy finds it difficult to act with speed. This attack slows your enemies attacks. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod)

DC.Name: The Raging Sea
DC.Description: Like a swimmer fighting against the raging sea, your enemy finds it difficult to act with speed. This attack slows your enemies attacks.

Feat.Name: The Trembling Earth
Feat.Description: Earth:Earth:Earth Finisher - The force of earth is behind your attacks, increasing your critical threat multiplier for this attack by 2 and partially bewildering your foe, preventing them from casting spells. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod)

DC.Name: The Trembling Earth
DC.Description: The force of earth is behind your attacks, increasing your critical threat multiplier for this attack by 2 and partially bewildering your foe, preventing them from casting spells. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect.

Feat.Name: Touch Of Despair
Feat.Description: Dark:Dark:Dark Finisher - You strike your opponent down with a terrible curse, halving all positive energy healing done to the target, reducing its fortification by 25% and increasing its negative energy vulnerability by 25%. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod) The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Touch Of Despair
DC.Description: You strike your opponent down with a terrible curse, halving all positive energy healing done to the target, reducing its fortification by 25% and increasing its negative energy vulnerability by 25%. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Timeless Body
Feat.Description: Your soul is balanced. No corrupt influences can possess your body after death - you are immune to the spawn effect of most undead.

Feat.Name: Tireless Rage
Feat.Description: At level 17, a barbarian no longer becomes fatigued after raging

Feat.Name: Toughness
Feat.Description: Increases your hit points by +3 at first level and 1 additional hit point for each additional level.

Feat.Name: Tower Shield Proficiency
Feat.Description: This feat negates the extra penalties from using a tower shield while untrained. The -2 attack penalty still applies.

Feat.Name: Trap Sense
Feat.Description: Barbarians receive a +1 bonus to saves against traps. This bonus increases every three Barbarian levels thereafter.

Feat.Name: Trap Sense
Feat.Description: Rogues receive a +1 bonus to saves against traps. This bonus increases every three Rogue levels thereafter.

Feat.Name: Trapfinding
Feat.Description: A Rogue or Artificer can detect and disable difficult traps.

Feat.Name: Trapmaking
Feat.Description: You have learned enough about traps to be able to scavenge parts from them, and with the help of the Free Agents, can craft your own.

Feat.Name: Trip
Feat.Description: Using this attack, you may trip the target, rendering it prone. Some creatures may be immune to this effect. A successful Balance check negates this effect. (DC of 10 + Strength modifier + related Enhancements + Vertigo).

DC.Name: Trip
DC.Description: Using this attack, you may trip the target, rendering it prone. Some creatures may be immune to this effect. A successful Balance check negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Turn Undead
Feat.Description: Character can turn undead (Charisma modifier +3) times per day.

DC.Name: Turn Undead
DC.Description: Attempts to drive away nearby undead or force them to cower.

Feat.Name: Two Handed Fighting
Feat.Description: Increases the damage of glancing blow attacks when wielding a two-handed weapon by 10% (from a base of 20% normal weapon damage). Also grants a 3% chance for weapon effects to trigger on glancing blows and a +2 Combat Style bonus to Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Two Weapon Blocking
Feat.Description: Increases the amount of damage you can block when defending with two weapons. (This does not apply when fighting unarmed/with handwraps.)

Feat.Name: Two Weapon Defense
Feat.Description: Grants you a +1 bonus to your AC and 5 physical resistance when you wield two weapons. (This bonus does not apply when fighting unarmed/with handwraps.)

Feat.Name: Two Weapon Fighting
Feat.Description: Reduces the to-hit penalty when using two weapons at the same time. The penalty for your primary hand lessens by 2 and the one for your off-hand lessens by 6, resulting in -4/-4 (instead of -6/-10 without this feat). If the off-hand weapon is light, both penalties decrease by another 2 points, down to -2/-2 (instead of -4/-8 without this feat). Two Weapon Fighting also increases the chance to proc an off-hand attack by 20% (applies to unarmed Monk), bringing the total chance to 40%.

Effect.DisplayName: Fake effect to cause update, never displayed, as effects handled in C++ code

Feat.Name: Unarmed Strike
Feat.Description: While centered (unarmored, unencumbered and wielding monk weapons), your fists and feat are lethal weapons.

Feat.Name: Uncanny Dodge
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to gain a temporary 25% Dodge bonus and a +4 reflex save bonus. This feat also grants you a 1% passive bonus to Dodge at levels 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 20.

Feat.Name: Unleash Iron Defender
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to summon your Iron Defender companion.

Feat.Name: Veil the Elements
Feat.Description: Elemental Form Modifer: Toggling this feat will allow you to still appear human while in elemental forms.

Feat.Name: Venom Immunity
Feat.Description: You are immune to ability score damage from natural poisons. (This has no effect on magical or supernatural poisons.)

Feat.Name: Walk Of The Sun
Feat.Description: Fire:Light:Fire Finisher - Activate this finisher to heighten the fire burning within the hearts of your allies, granting them bonuses to hit, skill checks and saves for a short period of time.

Feat.Name: Warforged Traits
Feat.Description: Warforged are naturally immune to sleep, energy drain, nausea, sickness, exhaustion and paralysis effects except those with physically hold them in place. You are immune to ability score damage from natural poisons and natural diseases, but are vulnerable to those that specifically affect wood or metal. You gain a +10 racial bonus to saving throws against magical poisons and do not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders you immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 11+your Fortitude save). If you transform into a different type of creature, you will lose these benefits until you return to your Warforged form.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Create Thrall
Feat.Description: Charm monster

Feat.Name: Warlock: Dark Delirium
Feat.Description: Plunge one enemy's mind into an illusory realm. that enemy is dazed and cannot act for 20 seconds. Each time this enemy is damaged, there's a 10% chance they break free. Does not affect bosses. There is no saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Dark One's Luck
Feat.Description: +2 to all saving throws

Feat.Name: Warlock: Deceive Item
Feat.Description: +5 Use Magic Device

Feat.Name: Warlock: Eldritch Blast Damage
Feat.Description: +1d6 Eldritch Blast base Damage

Feat.Name: Warlock: Eldritch Blast Focused
Feat.Description: Eldritch blast Shape: Toggle on to turn your basic attack into a ranged magical bolt dealing 1d6 force damage. This is treated as an evocation spell, and damage sales with 100% spell power. It is also affected normally by spell critical chance and spell critical damage. Gaining more warlock levels grants feats that increase this damage. This is not affected by metamagic feats, nor by melee and ranged feats. medium armor, heavy armor and shields can cause Eldritch Blast to suffer Arcane Spell Failure.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Entropic Ward
Feat.Description: +5 MRR, 25 Fortification

Feat.Name: Warlock: Hurl Through Hell
Feat.Description: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Exile one target enemy from this existence. An enemy succeeding on a Will save vs DC(10 + Warlock level + Charisma Modifier) is instead paralyzed and helpless with fear for 6 seconds.

DC.Name: Warlock: Hurl Through Hell
DC.Description: Exile one target enemy from this existence. An enemy succeeding on a Will save is instead paralyzed and helpless with fear for 6 seconds.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Misty escape
Feat.Description: You become invisible and charge forward. During your escape, you move through monsters as if you were ethereal. These effects last for six seconds

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact Damage
Feat.Description: +1d4 Eldritch Blast base Damage

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fey
Feat.Description: Your patron is a lord or lady of the fey, a creature of legend who holds secrets that were forgotten before the mortal races were born. This being's motivations are often inscrutable and sometimes whimsical and might involve a striving for greater magical power or the settling of age-old grudges. Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Obscuring Mist, 5 - Blindness, 9 - Slow, 14 - Greater Dispel Magic, 17 - Otto's Sphere of Dancing, 19 - Otto's Irresistible Dance

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fey
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fiend
Feat.Description: You have made a pact with a fiend from the lower planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil, even if you strive against those aims. Such beings desire the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you. Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses). Cannot be activated if Good. Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Command, 5 - Rage, 9 - Fire Shield, 14 - Binding Chain, 17 - Power Word: Blind, 19 - Howl of Terror

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fiend
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Great Old One
Feat.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses). Can not be activated if Lawful. Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1, 5, 9, 14, 17, 19: 1 - Entangle, 5 - Knock, 9 - Phantasmal Killer, 14 - Dominate Person, 17 - Mass Suggestion, 19 - Power Word: Kill

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Great Old One
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d4 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Paragon's Aegis
Feat.Description: +5 MRR

Feat.Name: Weapon Finesse
Feat.Description: You use your Dexterity bonus instead of Strength bonus to determine bonus to attack with certain weapons if it is higher. This feat applies to attacks made by a Dagger, Handaxe, Kama, Kukri, Light Hammer, Light Mace, Light Pick, Rapier, Short Sword, Sickle, or while unarmed or in a Druid animal form.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Bludgeoning Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a bludgeoning weapon, or when attacking from an animal form and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Piercing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a piercing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Ranged Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a ranged weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Slashing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a slashing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Thrown Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a thrown weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Bludgeoning Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a bludgeoning weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power. Also works in animal form.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Piercing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a piercing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Ranged Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a ranged weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Slashing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a slashing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Thrown Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a thrown weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power.

Feat.Name: Whirling Steel Strike
Feat.Description: You treat longswords as if they were monk weapons, remaining centered when you wield them.

Feat.Name: Whirlwind Attack
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Cleave: Activate this ability to attack all enemies in a 360 degree arc around you. This attack deals +4[W] damage.

Feat.Name: Wholeness of Body
Feat.Description: Your enlightenment allows you to heal your own wounds. This feat allows Monks expend 10 Ki to heal some hit points over time in a meditative state. The exact number regained is (Monk level)/2 + Wisdom modifier (rounded up) every two seconds for thirty seconds. This ability is not suitable for use in combat, as the Monk may neither move nor act while regenerating.

Feat.Name: Wild Empathy
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to lower an animal's or beast's aggression, effectively mesmerizing them.

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Bear
Feat.Description: You can transform into Bear form.

Stance.Name: Bear
Stance.Description: You transform into a Bear gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Wolf
Feat.Description: You can transform into Wolf form.

Stance.Name: Wolf
Stance.Description: You transform into a Wolf gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Dire Bear
Feat.Description: You can transform into Dire Bear form.

Stance.Name: Dire Bear
Stance.Description: You transform into a Dire Bear gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Fire Elemental
Feat.Description: You can transform into Fire Elemental form.

Stance.Name: Fire Elemental
Stance.Description: You transform into a Fire elemental gaining elemental specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Water Elemental
Feat.Description: You can transform into Water Elemental form.

Stance.Name: Water Elemental
Stance.Description: You transform into a Water elemental gaining elemental specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Winter Wolf
Feat.Description: You can transform into Winter Wolf form.

Stance.Name: Winter Wolf
Stance.Description: You transform into a Winter Wolf gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Zen Archery
Feat.Description: You can use your Wisdom bonus instead of Dexterity bonus to determine bonus to attack with ranged missile weapons (but not thrown weapons) if it is higher. You treat shortbows and longbows as if they were Ki weapons.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Artificer
Feat.Description: You were an Artificer in a past life. You occasionally find yourself tinkering with your gear. Each time you acquire this feat you gain a stacking +1 bonus to all Intelligence based skills and Use Magic Device. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Barbarian
Feat.Description: You were a Barbarian in a past life. You occasionally find yourself filled with a nearly irresistable urge to smash boxes. With your head. Each time you acquire this feat you gain 10 additional hit points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Bard
Feat.Description: You were a Bard in a past life. You occasionally find yourself humming a merry tune. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 to saves vs. enchantments and illusions. You gain 1 bard song usage. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Cleric
Feat.Description: You were a Cleric in a past life. You occasionally feel the presence of the divine. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to the DC's of your Conjuration spells, +1 Turn Undead attempt per rest and you Turn Undead as if you were two levels higher. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Druid
Feat.Description: You were a Druid in a past life. You occasionally find yourself gazing at the stars and get sentimental around mistletoe. Each time you acquire this feat your summoned creatures, charmed minions and hirelings gain +2 to all ability scores. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Favored Soul
Feat.Description: You were a Favored Soul in a past life. You occasionally find yourself wishing to leap off of tall things. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to spell penetration checks and gain 20 additional spell points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Fighter
Feat.Description: You were a Fighter in a past life. You occasionally find yourself filled with the urge to bark orders to your fellows in combat. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to attack rolls and +1 to the DC's of your tactical feats. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Monk
Feat.Description: You were a Monk in a past life. You occasionally find yourself contemplating the mysteries of life. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to damage rolls. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Paladin
Feat.Description: You were a Paladin in a past life. You occasionally find yourself overcome with righteous fervor. Each time you acquire this feat you gain 10% positive healing amplification. (This feat can be stacked up to 3 times, providing 10%, 20%, or 30% Healing Amplification.)

Feat.Name: Past Life: Ranger
Feat.Description: You were a Ranger in a past life. You occasionally find small animals in your backpack. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 damage with ranged weapons and +2 to elemental resistances. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Rogue
Feat.Description: You were a Rogue in a past life. You occasionally find yourself looking over your shoulder. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 to saves vs. traps and deal +1 damage when sneak attacking. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Sorcerer
Feat.Description: You were a Sorcerer in a past life. You occasionally find yourself daydreaming of dragons. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to the DC's of your Evocation spells and gain 20 additional spell points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Warlock
Feat.Description: You were a Warlock in a past life. You occasionally find yourself throwing your hands into the air. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +3 Magical Resistance. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Wizard
Feat.Description: You were a Wizard in a past life. You occasionally find yourself desiring a good book. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 to spell penetration checks and the DC's of Wands you use. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Aasimar Scourge
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1% Doublestrike and +2% Offhand Doublestrike per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1 Fortitude Save per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Aasimar
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1/2/3% Doublestick and +2/4/6% Offhand doublestrike.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Bladeforged
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10 Repair Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +5% Fortification per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Bladeforged
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10/20/30 Repair Spell Power.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Morninglord
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10/20/30 Light and +10/20/30 Alignment Spell Power Passive Bonus: +3 Positive Spell Power per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Morninglord
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10 Light and +10 Alignment Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 Positive Spell Power per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Purple Dragon Knight
Feat.Description: Group Action Boost: You and all allies within your aura for 20 seconds gain: +10/15/20% Action Boost bonus to movement speed +1/2/3 Action Boost bonus to Saving Throws

Feat.Name: Past Life: Shadar-Kai
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: When you are below 50% hit points and get hit by an attack, you gain 25% incorporeality for 6 seconds per Past Life: Shadar-kai (6, 12, or 18 seconds). This can occur once every two minutes. If this triggers along with Ghostly Essence, the bonuses stack their durations. Passive Bonus: +1% Dodge per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Shadar-Kai
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: When you are below 50% hit points and get hit by an attack, you gain 25% incorporeality for 6/12/18 seconds. This can occur once every two minutes.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Tiefling Scoundrel
Feat.Description: Inconic Past Life Stance: +10% Striding per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1 Reflex Saving throws per stack of this Past Life Feat.

Stance.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10% Striding per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Deep Gnome
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 Illusion DC to spells you cast and +5 Acid Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 Magical Resistance per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Deep Gnome
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1/2/3 Illusion DC and +5/10/15 Acid Spell Power

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Ancient Knowledge
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: +3 MRR per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Ancient Knowledge
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: +3 MRR per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Energy Criticals
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: 3% Critical Chance with Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Spells per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Energy Criticals
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: 3% Critical Chance with Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Spells per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Enchant Weapon
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Your mainhand equipped weapon gains +1 enhancement bonus per Enchant Weapon past life feat. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Enchant Weapon
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Your mainhand equipped weapon gains +1 enhancement bonus per Enchant Weapon past life feat.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Arcane Alacrity
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Cooldowns on your spells are reduced by 3%. Additional stacks of Arcane Alacrity past life increases this to 6% and then 10%. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Arcane Alacrity
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Cooldowns on your spells are reduced by 3%. Additional stacks of Arcane Alacrity past life increases this to 6% and then 10%.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Divine Sphere: Ancient Blessings
Feat.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +5 Positive, Negative and Repair Healing Amplification per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 PRR per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Ancient Blessings
Stance.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +5 Positive, Negative and Repair Healing Amplification per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Divine Sphere: Power Over Life and Death
Feat.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +10 Positive and +10 Negative Energy Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 PRR per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Ancient Power
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: +2 to Attack per stack of this past life. If you are fighting in Two Handed Fighting style, you also gain +2 Damage per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Fast Healing
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Each minute you heal with positive energy, 5 HP + 5 HP per every 5 character levels. Healing is doubled and tripled with two or three stacks of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Fast Healing
Stance.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Each minute you heal with positive energy, 5 HP + 5 HP per every 5 character levels. Healing is doubled and tripled with two or three stacks of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Colors of the Queen
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Your unarmed, melee and ranged attacks and spells have a 7% chance to produce a random effect. This triggers at most once every 30 seconds. Additional stacks of this past life reduce the triggered effect cooldown to 20 seconds and then 10 seconds. (Most of the random effects are extra damage or debuffs on the enemy you hit.) Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Feat.Name: Blinding Speed
Feat.Description: You are permanently hasted. You gain: 32% Enhancement Bonus to Movement Speed. 15% Enhancement Bonus to Melee Attack Speed. 22% Enhancement Bonus to Ranged Attack Speed. +1 Enhancement Bonus to Attack Rolls. +1% Dodge Bonus. +1 to Reflex Saving Throws.

Feat.Name: Bulwark of Defense
Feat.Description: Epic Feat: When in a defensive stance, you gain an additional +2 to all saving throws and +4 Armor Class.

Feat.Name: Burst of Glacial Wrath
Feat.Description: Cone spell, deals 300d6 Cold Damage and freezes creatures within the cone. Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Monsters who succeed a Fortitude save of (20 + the highest of your INT/WIS/CHA modifiers + Evocation bonuses) negate the freeze. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points.

DC.Description: Cone spell, deals 300d6 Cold Damage and freezes creatures within the cone. Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Monsters who succeed a Fortitude save of (20 + the highest of your INT/WIS/CHA modifiers + Evocation bonuses) negate the freeze.

Feat.Name: Combat Archery
Feat.Description: Your Ranged damage is increased by +1[W]. You also gain 2% dodge bonus when using a ranged weapon.

Feat.Name: Construct Exemplar
Feat.Description: You gain +20 Repair Amplification and 10 MRR

Feat.Name: Embolden Spell
Feat.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, you gain +2 to the DC of spells affected by Embolden Spell, but they consume 10 additional spell points. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Stance.Name: Embolden Spell
Stance.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, you gain +2 to the DC of spells affected by Embolden Spell, but they consume 10 additional spell points.

Feat.Name: Epic Eldritch Blast
Feat.Description: +3d6 Eldritch Blast dice.

Feat.Name: Epic Fortitude
Feat.Description: +2 Fortitude Saving Throws. You don't automatically fail Fortitude saving throws on a roll of 1.

Feat.Name: Epic Mental Toughness
Feat.Description: Increases your maximum spell points by 200 and your spell critical chance by 1%

Feat.Name: Epic Power
Feat.Description: +3 Melee Power, +3 Ranged Power, +6 Universal Spell Power and -1% to the Spell Point cost of all spells. This feat can be acquired multiple times and is granted every epic level.

Feat.Name: Epic Defensive Fighting
Feat.Description:
Your hero has learned to enter a reactive state, protecting themselves in the chaos of battle by rolling with the punches, but this hampers their ability to engage ranged threats.
While Toggle is active: 1: 5% Competence Bonus to max hit points, with an additional 5% for every combat "fighting" style feat you have, to a max of 25%. 2: All spell or spell like abilities that are effected by metamagics have their ranged reduced to touch range. 3: Reduces your Doubleshot and Ranged Power to 0 while active. 4: Exclusive from Range stances ---Improved Precise Shot, Archers Focus, Shiradi stances, Warlock Blast stances. 5: Exclusive from the Enlarge Spell Metamagic toggle 6: Remains active while dead 7: Can be used with other defensive/offensive stances and Rage

Stance.Name: Epic Defensive Fighting
Stance.Description:
Your hero has learned to enter a reactive state, protecting themselves in the chaos of battle by rolling with the punches, but this hampers their ability to engage ranged threats.
While Toggle is active: 1: 5% Competence Bonus to max hit points, with an additional 5% for every combat "fighting" style feat you have, to a max of 25%. 2: All spell or spell like abilities that are effected by metamagics have their ranged reduced to touch range. 3: Reduces your Doubleshot and Ranged Power to 0 while active. 4: Exclusive from Range stances ---Improved Precise Shot, Archers Focus, Shiradi stances, Warlock Blast stances. 5: Exclusive from the Enlarge Spell Metamagic toggle 6: Remains active while dead 7: Can be used with other defensive/offensive stances and Rage

Feat.Name: Epic Reputation

Feat.Name: Epic Saves
Feat.Description: As part of your epic training, you gain +1 to all saves. This feat can be acquired multiple times and is granted every other epic level.

Feat.Name: Epic Skills

Feat.Description: Your powers of persuasion and leadership are greater than normal. Your charisma increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Constitution
Feat.Description: Your health and endurance are greater than normal. Your constitution increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Dexterity

Feat.Name: Great Wisdom

Feat.Description: +1[W] with unarmed. +0.5[W] with other Ki weapons

Feat.Name: Inspire Excellence
Feat.Description: You can improve the abilities of your comrades through your performance. This song grants a +2 comptetence bonus to all ability scores to yourself and all allies near you. Requires 20 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

Feat.Name: Intensify Spell
Feat.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, you gain 75 Spell Power while casting spells affected by Intensify Spell, but they cost 15 additional spell points. This bonus stacks with Empower. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Description: +20 Sonic Spell Power. Sphere: Arcane or Primal Number of Destinies: 1

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Power: Positive
Feat.Description: +20 Positive Spell Power. Sphere: Arcane or Primal Number of Destinies: 1

Feat.Name: Mass Frog
Feat.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (20+ Wisdom modifier). Spell Point Cost:75 Target: Self, Foe, Directional, Breakable Sphere: Primal Number of Destinies: 2

DC.Name: Mass Frog
DC.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw. Base DC is officially 20, but currently 30 in game.

Feat.Name: Perfect Two Handed Fighting
Feat.Description: Increases the damage of glancing blow attack when wielding a two-handed weapon by an additional 10%. Also increases the chance for weapon effects to trigger on glancing blows by an additional 10%. Sphere: Primal Number of Destinies: 1

Feat.Name: Perfect Two Weapon Fighting
Feat.Description: +5% Doublestrike. +10% Offhand Doublestrike. Sphere: Primal Number of Destinies: 1

Feat.Name: Arcane Warrior
Feat.Description: Your weapon and unarmed attacks grant you a stack of Arcane Warrior: Magical (+2 Universal Spell Power). Your offensive spells grant you a stack of Arcane Warrior: Physical (+1 Melee and Ranged Power). Each of these stacks to 20 times and each stack lasts for 12 seconds. You may gain a stack of each no more than once per second. Sphere: Arcane, Martial Number of Destinies: 2, 1

Feat.Name: Dreamscape
Feat.Description: You are invulnerable and invisible for five seconds, then return with a random 30-second buff. Cooldown: 1 minute Activate to pop off to the land of dreams. Sphere: Primal, Arcane Number of Destinies: 2, 1

Feat.Name: Embodiment of Law
Feat.Description: With weapon and unarmed attacks, deal 10 Bane damage against all targets and an additional 20 Law damage against Chaotic targets. This scales with Melee or Ranged power depending on your weapons. Sphere: Martial, Divine Number of Destinies: 2, 1

Feat.Name: Fount of Life
Feat.Description: +20 Healing Amp and Positive Spell Power Sphere: Divine, Primal Number of Destinies: 2, 1

Feat.Name: Harbinger of Chaos
Feat.Description: With weapon and unarmed attacks, deal 1d20 Bane damage against all targets and an additional 2d20 Chaos damage against Lawful targets. This scales with Melee or Ranged power depending on your weapons. Sphere: Martial, Primal Number of Destinies: 2, 1

Feat.Name: Spirit Blades
Feat.Description: Spell: Create a series of spectral blades which fly at a nearby opponent. Each of the five blades does 2d20 Piercing and 1d20 Force damage. Sphere: Arcane, Divine Number of Destinies: 2, 1

Feat.Name: Wind through the Trees
Feat.Description: When enemies hit or miss you, they have a 5% chance to be knocked down with no save. This may only trigger once every 12 seconds.

Feat.Name: Scion of Arborea
Feat.Description: +20 Melee and Ranged Power +20 Force Spell Power and +20 Universal Spell Power +2 to the Enhancement Bonus of your weapon +4 to Fortitude Saves

Feat.Name: Scion of Celestia
Feat.Description: +20 Positive, Light and Alignment Spell Power, +20 Universal Spell Power +30% Crit Damage with Positive, Light and Alignment spells +150 Maximum Hit Points +4 to Will Saves

Feat.Name: Scion of Elysium
Feat.Description: Summoned creatures gain +25 PRR and MRR Your summoned creatures, pets and hirelings gain +20 Melee Power, Ranged Power, and Universal Spell Power Your summoned creatures, pets and hirelings gain +100% Fortification Each time one of your summoned creatures, pets, or hirelings would be damaged, it has a +5% chance to completely ignore the damage. (Untyped/Bane damage bypass this defense).

Feat.Name: Scion of Limbo
Feat.Description: +2 Determination Bonus to all Saves In addition, every minute, you will receive a powerful beneficial effect that lasts for one minute. There are several possibilities, determined via the chaos of Limbo.

Feat.Name: Scion of Mechanus
Feat.Description: +20 Repair and Rust Spell Power, +20 Universal Spell Power, +20 Repair Amplification (assuming you take healing from Repair), +10% Fortification Bypass on weapon and unarmed attacks, Gain: Master Reconstruction, shares cooldown with Communion of Scribing.

Feat.Name: Scion of the Astral Plane
Feat.Description: +4 to Tactical Feat and Assassinate DCs, +4% Doublestrike and Doubleshot. An additional +4 if you are centered. +4% Dodge and Dodge Cap, +4 to Reflex Saves.

Feat.Name: Scion of the Ethereal Plane
Feat.Description: Permanent Blur, +1 point of Sneak Attack damage for every 3 points of Hide you have, +4 to all Skills, Permanent Invisibility Guard, as per the item effect.

Effect.DisplayName: Scion of the Ethereal Plane: Hide/3 bonus

Feat.Name: Scion of the Feywild
Feat.Description: +10 Sonic Spell Power, +30 Universal Spell Power, +4 to the DCs of Enchantment spells, +2 to DCs of other spells, Add 2d20 Sonic damage to weapon and unarmed attacks (Scales with Spell Power), +20 Healing Amp

Feat.Name: Scion of the Plane of Air
Feat.Description: +4 to the DCs of Evocation spells, +2 to the DCs of other spells, +4% Dodge, +4 to Dodge Cap, +10 Electric Spell Power, +30 Universal Spell Power, Add 2d20 Electric damage to weapon and unarmed attacks (Scales with Spell Power).

Feat.Name: Scion of the Plane of Earth
Feat.Description: +4 to the DCs of Conjuration spells, +2 to the DCs of other spells, +20 PRR, +10 Acid Spell Power, +30 Universal Spell Power, Add 2d20 Acid damage to weapon and unarmed attacks (Scales with Spell Power).

Feat.Name: Scion of the Plane of Fire
Feat.Description: +25% Spell Critical Damage with all spells, +10 PRR and +10 MRR, +10 Fire Spell Power, +30 Universal Spell Power, Add 2d20 Fire damage to weapon and unarmed attacks (Scales with Spell Power).

Feat.Name: Scion of the Plane of Water
Feat.Description: +200 Maximum Spell Points, +20 MRR, +10 Cold Spell Power, +30 Universal Spell Power, Add 2d20 Cold damage to weapon and unarmed attacks (Scales with Spell Power).

Feat.Name: Scion of the Shadowfell
Feat.Description: +4 to the DCs of Necromancy spells, +2 to DCs of other spells, +40 Negative Spell Power, +20 Negative Amp (assuming you take healing from Negative), Weapons and Unarmed attacks gain Superior Vampirism.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Aasimar
Feat.Description: You were Aasimar in a previous life Tier1: +1 Heal Tier2: +1 Wisdom Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Dragonborn
Feat.Description: You were Dragonborn in a previous life Tier1: +1 Spellcraft Tier2: +1 Charisma Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Drow
Feat.Description: You were Drow in a previous life Tier1: +1 Search Tier2: +1 Intelligence Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Dwarf
Feat.Description: You were a Dwarf in a previous life Tier1: +1 Balance Tier2: +1 Constitution Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Elf
Feat.Description: You were an Elf in a previous life Tier1: +1 Spot Tier2: +1 Dexterity Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Gnome
Feat.Description: You were a Gnome in a previous life Tier1: +1 Use Magic Device Tier2: +1 Intelligence Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Halfling
Feat.Description: You were a Halfling in a previous life Tier1: +1 Move Silently Tier2: +1 Dexterity Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Half-Elf
Feat.Description: You were a Half-Elf in a previous life Tier1: +1 Diplomacy Tier2: +1 Charisma Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Half-Orc
Feat.Description: You were a Half-Orc in a previous life Tier1: +1 Intimidate Tier2: +1 Strength Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Human
Feat.Description: You were a Human in a previous life Tier1: +1 Haggle Tier2: +1 Wisdom Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Tiefling
Feat.Description: You were a Tiefling in a previous life Tier1: +1 Spell Craft Tier2: +1 Charisma Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Past Life: Warforged
Feat.Description: You were Warforged in a previous life Tier1: +1 Repair Tier2: +1 Constitution Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: Black
Feat.Description: You ancestry is linked to Black Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Acid Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: Blue
Feat.Description: You ancestry is linked to Blue Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Electric Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: Red
Feat.Description: You ancestry is linked to Red Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Fire Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: White
Feat.Description: You ancestry is linked to White Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Cold Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fey: Blindness
Feat.Description: Renders an enemy blinded. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Rage
Feat.Description: This area of effect spell grants to targets +2 morale bonus to Strength and to Constitution, +1 morale bonus on will saves and a -2 penalty to Armor Class. The spell's duration is 60 + 6 seconds per caster level.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Knock
Feat.Description: Unlocks locked doors and chests as if a Rogue with a Open Lock skill of caster level+casting ability modifier (Charisma for Warlocks) was attempting to pick the lock.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fey: Slow
Feat.Description: One target moves at 50% run speed, attacks at a 30% slowed rate, -1 on Attack rolls, Armor Class and Reflex saves. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Fire Shield
Feat.Description: Wreaths the caster in hot or cold flames. Any creature striking you in melee takes 1d3+3 plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.) damage. The Fire version of this spell deals fire damage and reduces damage the caster takes from cold by half. The cold version of this spell deals cold damage and reduces damage the caster takes from fire by half. The flame from the fire version will burn away any webs that attempt to entangle you.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Phantasmal Killer
Feat.Description: A target who fails a Will saving throw followed by a failed Fortitude saving throw dies from fear. A successful Fortitude save still results in 1d3 + 1 damage per caster level. A Will save disbelieves the spell and negates ill effects.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fey: Greater Dispel Magic
Feat.Description: Removes ongoing spells that have been cast on a target. You must make a caster level check of 1d20+your caster level (Maximum caster level 20.) of DC 11+spell's caster level to remove an effect. In addition, this spell can be used to sever the connection between a summoner and his or her summoned monster, causing the summoned creature to attack unpredictably, possibly turning on its summoner. If cast on a spell ward trap, this spell will reduce the level of the trap by 1d4 levels. If the level of the trap is reduced to 0, the trap is disabled.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Binding Chain
Feat.Description: Spell info here

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Dominate Person
Feat.Description: You can control the actions of any humanoid creature that fails its Will save through a telepathic link that you establish with the subjects mind. Dominate acts like Charm Person, with additional Will saves every 15 to 30 seconds, but the creature will follow you throughout the dungeon.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fey: Otto's Sphere of Dancing
Feat.Description: A magical sphere that compels all enemies who enter it to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Power Word: Blind
Feat.Description: A single word of power is uttered, causing your target to become Blinded. Creatures are Blinded for at least 6+6d4 seconds and players are Blinded for at least 4+1d6 seconds. Creatures with more than 100,000 Hit Points are unaffected by Power Word: Blind.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Mass Suggestion
Feat.Description: Casts Suggestion on multiple enemies. The actions of affected enemies are influenced by you, allowing you to suggest that they fight as your allies for 6 seconds per caster level. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fey: Otto's Irresistible Dance
Feat.Description: This spell makes it impossible for the enemy to do anything other than caper and prance in place.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Howl of Terror
Feat.Description: You utter a terrifying howl, filling your foes with a paralyzing fear. Foes around you are paralyzed for 6 to 24 seconds. Will save negates.

Feat.Name: Pact Spell Fiend: Power Word: Kill
Feat.Description: A single word causes the death of a single enemy with no saving throw allowed. Cooldown timer of 210 seconds.

Feat.Name: Beguiling Defenses
Feat.Description: You naturally move in strange and unpredicable ways. +1 Reflex saving throws

Feat.Name: Fiendish Resilience
Feat.Description: You are unnaturally resilient due to your fiendish association. +1 Fortitude saving throws

Feat.Name: Thought Shield
Feat.Description: Your detachment from the physical means you are harder influence. +1 Will Saves

Feat.Name: Follower of Aureon
Feat.Description: You follow Aureon, member of the Sovereign Host and use his favored weapon. You are proficient with Quarterstaves and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Blood of Vol
Feat.Description: You follow the Blood of Vol. You are proficient with Daggers and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Lord of Blades
Feat.Description: You follow the Lord of Blades. You are proficient with Great Swords and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of Olladra
Feat.Description: You follow Olladra, member of the Sovereign Host and use his favorite weapon. You are proficient with Sickles and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of Onatar
Feat.Description: You follow Onatar, member of the Sovereign Host and use his favorite weapon. You are proficient with Warhammers and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Silver Flame
Feat.Description: You follow the Silver Flame. You are proficient with Longbows and gain +1 to hit with them

Feat.Name: Follower of the Sovereign Host
Feat.Description: You follow the Sovereign Host. You are proficient with Longswords and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Undying Court
Feat.Description: You follow the Undying Court. You are proficient with Scimitars and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Follower of Vulkoor
Feat.Description: You follow Vulkoor. You are proficient with Shortswords and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Favored by Amaunator
Feat.Description: You follow Amaunator. You are proficient with heavy maces and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Favored by Helm
Feat.Description: You follow Helm. You are proficient with bastard swords and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Name: Favored by Silvanus
Feat.Description: You follow Silvanus. You are proficient with mauls and gain +1 to hit with them.

Feat.Description: You follow Aureon. You gain +2 to attack and damage rolls with Quarterstaves.

Feat.Name: Aureon's Instruction
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Aureon and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Aureon's wisdom for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Wisdom, +3 to Spell Penetration, +2 to your effective level for Turn Undead, +4 to maximum Hit Dice affected when using Turn Undead and +4 to the total Hit Dice affected by Turn Undead.

Stance.Name: Aureon's Instruction
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Aureon and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Aureon's wisdom for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Wisdom, +3 to Spell Penetration, +2 to your effective level for Turn Undead, +4 to maximum Hit Dice affected when using Turn Undead and +4 to the total Hit Dice affected by Turn Undead.

Feat.Name: The Blood is The Life
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of The Blood of Vol and your zeal has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the power within your own blood for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Constitution, 100% Fortification, +10 to Fortitude Saves, PRR and MRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have. While in this state and have a Dagger in your main hand, you also gain Vampirism, stacking with other sources of Vampirism.

Requirement.Feat: Follower of the Blood of Vol

Stance.Name: The Blood is The Life
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of The Blood of Vol and your zeal has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the power within your own blood for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Constitution, 100% Fortification, +10 to Fortitude Saves, PRR and MRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have. While in this state and have a Dagger in your main hand, you also gain Vampirism, stacking with other sources of Vampirism.

Feat.Name: Bladesworn Transformation
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Lord of Blades and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to attempt to become a juggernaut of destruction for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. While transformed, you have a +4 Profane bonus to Strength, +4 natural armor bonus to AC, a +4 profane bonus on damage rolls, +10 enhancement bonus to Will saves against mind affecting magic and proficiency in all simple and martial weapons. Your base attack bonus equals your level. You lose your spellcasting ability. You have immunity to critical hits and sneak attacks, but cannot be healed by healing spells.

Requirement.Feat: Follower of the Lord of Blades

Stance.Name: Bladesworn Transformation
Stance.Description: You become a juggernaut of destruction for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. While transformed, you have a +4 Profane bonus to Strength, +4 natural armor bonus to AC, a +4 profane bonus on damage rolls, +10 enhancement bonus to Will saves against mind affecting magic and proficiency in all simple and martial weapons. Your base attack bonus equals your level. You lose your spellcasting ability. You have immunity to critical hits and sneak attacks, but cannot be healed by healing spells.

Feat.Name: Luck of Olladra
Feat.Description: Luck of Olladra: You are a devoted follower of Olladra and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to heal yourself or an ally to full health and bestow +1d6 Luck bonus to each Ability Score, lasting 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have.

Feat.Name: Onatar's Forge
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Onatar and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Onatar's mighty forge for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +3 to tactical feat DCs, +10 Melee Power, +10 Repair Spell Power, +10 Rust Spell Power and +10 Fire Spell Power. If you are a Warforged or otherwise already benefit from Repair, you gain +30 Repair Amplification.

Stance.Name: Onatar's Forge
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Onatar and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Onatar's mighty forge for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +3 to tactical feat DCs, +10 Melee Power, +10 Repair Spell Power, +10 Rust Spell Power and +10 Fire Spell Power. If you are a Warforged or otherwise already benefit from Repair, you gain +30 Repair Amplification.

Feat.Name: Silver Flame Exorcism
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Silver Flame and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to attempt to exorcise an extraplanar creature, which is entirely consumed in holy fire on a failed Will save or savagely burned by the light of the Silver Flame. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage to half. The Save DC for this ability is 10 + Cleric Level + Charisma Modifier.

DC.Name: Silver Flame Exorcism
DC.Description: Activate this ability to attempt to exorcise an extraplanar creature, which is entirely consumed in holy fire on a failed Will save or savagely burned by the light of the Silver Flame. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage to half.

Feat.Name: Undying Call
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Undying Court and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to lead a dead ally's spirit back to this world, acting as a True Resurrection on high elven spirits or a Raise Dead for others.

Feat.Name: Unyielding Sovereignty
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Sovereign Host and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to fully heal hit point damage done to a targeted ally, remove ability damage, death penalty effects, negative levels and the conditions blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned and stunned.

Feat.Name: Vulkoor's Avatar
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Vulkoor and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to to ask Vulkoor to send one of his servants to destroy your enemies. Duration: 10 minutes

Feat.Name: Amaunator's Brilliance
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Amaunator and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to turn on your Fire Shield (Fire).

Feat.Name: Ever Watchful
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Helm and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the vigilance of Helm for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain True Seeing, +5 Sacred bonus to Spot and Search, +4 Wisdom, +5 to Fortitude saves and PRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have.

Stance.Name: Ever Watchful
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Helm and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the vigilance of Helm for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain True Seeing, +5 Sacred bonus to Spot and Search, +4 Wisdom, +5 to Fortitude saves and PRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have.

Feat.Name: Blessing of Silvanus
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Silvanus and your faith has been rewarded. Toggling this on gives you Blessing of Silvanus: You permanently gain a +4 natural armor bonus to AC and Mauls you wield gain +2 to their Critical Threat Range.

Stance.Name: Blessing of Silvanus
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Silvanus and your faith has been rewarded. Toggling this on gives you Blessing of Silvanus: You permanently gain a +4 natural armor bonus to AC and Mauls you wield gain +2 to their Critical Threat Range.

Feat.Description: You follow Amaunator. You have +1 to attack and damage rolls with heavy maces.

Feat.Name: Beloved of the Lord of Blades
Feat.Description: You are a favored soul of the Lord of Blades. You deal 2 extra damage with Great Swords.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Lord of Blades Damage Reduction: Adamantine
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Lord of Blades fear not the weapons of most opponents. You gain damage reduction 10/adamantine, or improve your existing damage reduction by 10/adamantine.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Undying Court Damage Reduction: Cold Iron
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Undying Court can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Vulkoor the Hunter Damage Reduction: Good
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Vulkoor the Hunter can ward themselves against all but the light. You gain damage reduction 10/Good.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Silver Flame Damage Reduction: Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Silver Flame can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Silver.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Sovereign Host Damage Reduction: Cold Iron, Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Sovereign Host can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron, Silver.
