Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Olladra can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Onatar Damage Reduction: Cold Iron
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Onatar can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Silvanus Damage Reduction: Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Silvanus can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Silver.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Evocation spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. Your lightning spells will use Light Spell Power if it is higher, and your light spells will use Lightning Spell power if it is higher. Turn Undead now works on Elemental creatures. Additionally, using Turn Undead provides a bonus to your party's Reflex saving throws equal to half of your Cleric level and Electric Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level, for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 Spot, +1 Listen and +1 Reflex saving throws for every 2 Cleric levels. Your Turn Undead works on Animal creatures. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Constitution equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to Will saving throws for every 2 Cleric levels. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains 1d20 points of Universal Spell Power and 1d10 points (each rolled separately) of Melee Power, Ranged Power, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Necromancy spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. You gain +2 to your effective Cleric level to Turn Undead and +2 to the hit dice of undead effected.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 Melee and Ranged Power. You gain another point of each at Cleric levels 4, 8, 12, 16 and 20. You can cast your Cleric spells while Raging. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Melee and Ranged Power equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Acid Spell Power (Corrosion) per Cleric Level. Your acid spells will use Light Spell Power if it is higher. Your light spells will use Acid Spell Power if it is higher. Your Turn Undead works on Elemental creatures. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a bonus to Fortitude saving throws equal to half your Cleric level and points of Acid Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Fire Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Fire Spell Power (Combustion) per Cleric Level. Your fire spells will use Light Spell Power if it is higher. Your light spells will use Fire Spell Power if it is higher. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Fire Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds. Your Turn Undead works on Elemental creatures.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Light Spell Power (Radiance) per Cleric Level. You gain +1 to the Heal skill for every 2 Cleric levels. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains temporary Hit Points equal to five times your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Positive Spell Power (Devotion) per Cleric Level. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains 20 points of Healing Amplification.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 to all skills. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Intelligence equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Enchantment spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use your Turn Undead, your party gains a Sacred bonus to saving throws equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to your Fortitude, Reflex and Will saving throws. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to saving throws equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Evocation spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Universal Spell Power equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to Armor Class, Physical Resistance Rating, and Magical Resistance Rating. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 5, 10, 15 and 20. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to PRR and MRR equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Strength. You passively restore all ability score damage to Strength every 6 seconds. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Strength equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 to Fire (Combustion) and Light Spell Power (Radiance) per Cleric level. When you use Turn Undead, you and your allies gain True Sight. In addition, for 20 seconds, enemies in the radius of the Turn Undead have their Incorporeal miss chance negated and will be inflicted with 10% Vulnerability to Light damage.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Enchantment spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Charisma equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to-hit and damage with melee and ranged weapons. This increases at Cleric levels 4, 8, 12, 16 and 20. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Melee Power and Ranged Power equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain Water Breathing. You gain +1 to Swimming and +2 Cold Spell Power (Glaciation) per Cleric level. Your cold spells will use Positive Spell Power if it is higher. Your healing spells will use Cold Spell Power if it is higher. Your Turn Undead works on Elemental creatures. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a bonus to Will saving throws equal to half you Cleric level and points of Cold Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Shocking Grasp as an SLA. 4 Spell Points, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Lightning Bolt as an SLA. 8 Spell Points, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Chain Lightning as an SLA. 12 Spell Points, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain 10 hit points per Cleric level. You also add 10 hit points for each Epic level you have gained.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain +15% Fortification bypass.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain the Feral Charge ability. Your character briefly morphs into a bear and charges forward through foes, attacking all foes in the charge area. The attack does weapon damage based on your equipped weapon with a +3[W] bonus and enemies must make a Reflex saving throw with a DC of 19 + Wisdom modifier + Trip Bonuses or be knocked down. Cooldown is 15 seconds. This ability can only be used while holding a melee weapon.

DC.Name: Animal Domain Tier IV
DC.Description: The attack does weapon damage based on your equipped weapon with a +3[W] bonus and enemies must make a Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Chaos Hammer as an SLA. 6 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Chaos Hammer as an SLA. 6 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Prismatic Spray as an SLA. 25 SP, 15 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Necrotic Ray as an SLA. 8 Spell Points, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You are immune to Energy Drain.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Destruction as an SLA. 20 SP, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: Durability damage for your items is reduced by 75%.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: +3% Doublestrike and +3 to Glancing Blow to-hit and damage.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: Your weapon strikes add a stack of Improved Destruction.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Melf's Acid Arrow as an SLA. 4 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Stoneskin as an SLA. 6 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Earthquake as an SLA. 25 SP, 30 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Fire Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Scorching Ray as an SLA. 4 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Fire Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Wall of Fire as an SLA. 15 SP, 30 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Fire Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Firestorm as an SLA. 8 Spell Points, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Deific Vengeance as an SLA. 2 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Blade Barrier as an SLA. 20 Spell Points, 30 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain +3 to hit, damage and armor class against evil creatures in combat. You gain +3 to saving throws against spells cast by evil creatures.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Cure Moderate Wounds as an SLA. 4 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Panacea as an SLA. 8 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: Your healing spells are Empowered, as if you had the Empower Healing Metamagic Feat. This does not increase the cost of your healing spells.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Suggestion as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Feeblemind as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain +4 Spell Penetration. You gain +2 to the DC of all spells.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Order's Wrath as an SLA. 6 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Greater Command as an SLA. 15 SP, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain +3 to hit, damage and Armor Class against Chaotic creatures in combat. You gain +3 to saving throws against spells cast by Chaotic creatures.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Displacement as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You add +2 to the DC of your spells.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You no longer automatically fail your saving throws on a roll of 1.

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Chain Missiles as an SLA. 8 SP, 10 second cooldown. (This shares a cooldown with the Archmage SLA.)

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain a number of bonus Spell Points equal to your character level x 10.

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain points of Universal Spell Power equal to twice your Cleric level.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain the Shield spell as a permanent effect on you.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Radiant Forcefield as an SLA. 10 Spell Points, 180 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: Your Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating are increased by your Cleric level.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: Your Reflex saving throws are now based on Strength instead of Dexterity if it is higher.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You become immune to knock down effects.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You always make your saving throw against Stun effects.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Searing Light as an SLA. 4 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Sunbeam as an SLA. 8 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Sunburst as an SLA. 20 SP, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Invisibility as an SLA. 4 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Mind Fog as an SLA. 15 SP, 10 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Charm Monster, Mass as an SLA. 40 SP, 20 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain proficiency in all Martial and Exotic weapons.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: Your tactical DCs are increased by half your Cleric level.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Holy Sword as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Solid Fog as an SLA. 10 SP, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Cone of Cold as an SLA. 10 SP, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Greater Creeping Cold as an SLA. 10 SP, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Grace of Battle
Feat.Description: Your faith allows you to use your Charisma bonus for to-hit and damage purposes with your dieties' Favored Weapon if it is higher than your Strength bonus. This benefit only applies if your Favored Soul level is equal to or greater than half of your total Heroic Character level.

Feat.Name: Knowledge of Battle
Feat.Description: Your faith allows you to use your Wisdom bonus for to-hit and damage purposes with your dieties' Favored Weapon if it is higher than your Strength bonus. This benefit only applies if your Favored Soul level is equal to or greater than half of your total Heroic Character level.

Feat.Name: Stout of Heart
Feat.Description: You gain 10 Hit Points per Favored Soul or Epic level.

Effect.DisplayName: Stout of Heart: Favored Soul Levels

Feat.Name: Purity of Heart
Feat.Description: You gain 20 Spell Points per Favored Soul level and 30 Spell Points per Epic level.

Effect.DisplayName: Purity of Heart: Favored Soul Levels

Feat.Name: Aasimar: Protector Bond
Feat.Description: While protector stance is active you gain +1 Charisma and +1 to Will saving throws.

Stance.Name: Aasimar: Protector Bond
Stance.Description: While this stance is active you gain +1 Charisma and +1 to Will saving throws. You also gain access to your Healing Hands ability, plus any additional enhancements trained dependant on this stance being active

Feat.Name: Aasimar: Fallen Bond
Feat.Description: While fallen stance is active you gain +1 Strength and +1 to Reflex saving throws.

Stance.Name: Aasimar: Fallen Bond
Stance.Description: While this stance is active you gain +1 Strength and +1 to Reflex saving throws. You also gain access to your Healing Hands ability, plus any additional enhancements trained dependant on this stance being active

Feat.Name: Aasimar: Scourge Bond
Feat.Description: While Scourge stance is active you gain +1 Constitution and +1 to Fortitude saving throws.

Stance.Name: Aasimar: Scourge Bond
Stance.Description: While this stance is active you gain +1 Constitution and +1 to Fortitude saving throws. You also gain access to your Healing Hands ability, plus any additional enhancements trained dependant on this stance being active

Feat.Name: Aasimar Racial Traits
Feat.Description: You gain a racial lay on hands SLA which heals for 10 + Character Level * Wisdom Modifier. +2 Racial bonus to Heal, Listen and Spot. +5 Resistance to Cold, Acid and Electricity

Feat.Name: Bardic Ballad
Feat.Description:
You are constantly surrounded by a faint aura of Bardic Music, and it benfits you and your nearby allies in combat. You and all nearby allies receive the benefits of Inspire Courage as long as you are alive and not incapacitated. Certain Bard feats and abilities can alter or increase the benefits of your Aria.
Inspire Courage: You and nearby allies benefit from +1 to hit, damage, saves vs Fear, and +3 Universal Spell Power. Duration: 1 Minute

Feat.Name: Bardic Inspiration
Feat.Description:
Activate this ability to Inspire a single target ally or yourself. This ability's base duration is 5 minutes plus 30 seconds per Bard level. Fuure Bard abilities can modify or increase the effect of your inspiration, and gaining more effective Bard Level will increase the duration of this ability. At Bard Level 3, this automaticall includes Inspire Competence.
Inspire Competence: Grants you or a single ally +4 Music Bonus to all Skills.

Feat.Name: Suggestion
Feat.Description: Activate this bard ability to charm a fascinated foe for a short time. Requires 9 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

DC.Name: Suggestion
DC.Description: Allows you to intimidate certain NPCs and to draw the attention of monsters while in battle. You will suffer a -4 penalty to your intimidate skill for every size category you are smaller than the creature your are trying to intimidate, or +4 for every size category your are larger. (15 second cooldown)

Feat.Name: Soothing Song
Feat.Description:
Sing a Song to apply a small positive energy heal to your target and nearby party members.
In addition, your inspire courage now gives an additional +1 bonus to attack, damage, and fear saves, and +3 Universal Spell Power

Feat.Name: Ballad Melody: Greatness
Feat.Description:
Adds the effects of Inspire Greatness to your Bardic Ballad. Other Bard abilities may modify and increase the effects of Inspire Greatness.
Inspire Greatness: Allies and yourself benefit from +20 Temporary Hit Points, +3 Physical Resistance Rating, and +10 Healing Amplification as long as you are not incapacitated and they are within the Ballad.
Requires 12 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill.

Feat.Name: Song of Freedom
Feat.Description: Activate this bard ability to create an effect equivalent to the break enchantment spell on one of your allies. Requires 15 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill.

Feat.Name: Improved Bardic Music
Feat.Description: Inspire Greatness now grants an additional +1 to all Skills, and Inspire Heroics now grants an additional +1 to Armor Class, Dodge, and all Saves. You sing your Bardic Inspiration as if you had two more Bard Levels.

Feat.Name: Improved Inspire Courage
Feat.Description: Your Inspire Courage now gives an additional +2 bonus to attack, damage, and fear saves, and an additional +3 Universal Spell Power. Duration: 1 minute

Feat.Name: Inspire Heroics
Feat.Description: Adds the effects of Inspire Heroics to your Bardic Ballad. Inspire Heroics: +4 Music bonus to all saves, +4 Music bonus to Armor Class, and +4% Music bonus to Dodge. Requires 18 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

Feat.Name: Knight's Training
Feat.Description: You have undergone rigorous military training with the traditional weapons of war. These weapons receive one of the following morale bonuses in your hands. * Longsword critical multiplier is increased by 1 * Battle Axes critical threat range is increased by 1. Increased by 2 if you have Improved Critical: Slashing. * Heavy Maces, Morning Stars and War Hammers critical threat range is increased by 1

Feat.Name: Swords to Plowshares
Feat.Description: You are an expert with the usage of traditionally nonviolent weapons in impressive ways. When wielding one of the following weapons, you are granted the following: Quarterstaves, Kamas and Sickles you wield gain a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range.

Feat.Name: Sharn City Council Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Favor 75 - "Sharn City Council: Skill Bonus" - "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Bluff and Haggle skills." Rank 2: Favor 150 - "Sharn City Council: Hit Point Bonus" - "This feat grants you +5 HP."

Effect.DisplayName: Sharn City Council: Hit Point Bonus

Feat.Name: Gate Keepers Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Favor 75 - "Gatekeepers: Skill Bonus" - "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Concentration and Spot skills." Rank 2: Favor 150 - "Gatekeepers: Hit Point Bonus" - "This feat grants you +5 HP."

Feat.Name: House Jorasco Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1 :"House Jorasco: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 bonus to the Heal and Diplomacy skills." Rank 2: "House Jorasco: Hit Point Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP."

Feat.Name: House Deneith Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: "House Deneith: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 Intimidate and Search skills." Rank 2: "House Deneith: Hit Points Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP."

Feat.Name: Purple Dragon Knight Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Key to Eveningstar Rank 2: "Purple Dragon Knights: Hit Point Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP." Rank 3: Apply Set bonuses to certain items. Rank 4: "Purple Dragon Knights: Save Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 saves versus Evil Creatures."

Effect.DisplayName: Purple Dragon Knights: Hit Point Bonus

Feat.Name: House Phiarlan Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: "House Phiarlan: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Hide and Perform skills."

Feat.Name: The Twelve Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Small ingredients bag. Rank 2: Large Ingredients bag. Rank 3: Nothing* Rank 4: "Twelve: Save Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 saves versus Spell Saves."

Feat.Name: Agents of Argonnesson Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Choice of item. Rank 2: "Agents of Argonnesson: Draconic Vitality" "This feat grants you +10 HP" Rank 3: "Agents of Argonnesson: Save Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 saves versus Dragons."

Feat.Name: The Harpers Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: "Harpers: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Perform and Bluff skills." Rank 2: "Harpers: Hit Point Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP." Rank 3: Access to the Harper Agent Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Keepers of a Feather Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Grants a +2 saves bonus versus Undead Rank 2: Small Augment Bag Rank 3: Access to the Vistani Enhancement Tree

Feat.Name: The Free Agents Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Access to Free Agents vendor in the Harbor. Rank 2: Additional purchases available from the Free Agents vendor. Rank 3: Specialist item repair in Zawabis Refuge. Rank 4: Access to the Falconry Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Falconry Tree
Feat.Description: You have access to the Falconry enhancement tree through a DDO store purchase or you have previously unlocked this tree for this character.

Feat.Name: Harper Agent Tree
Feat.Description: You have access to the Harper Agent enhancement tree through a DDO store purchase or you have previously unlocked this tree for this character.

Feat.Name: Inquisitive Tree
Feat.Description: You have access to the Inquisitive enhancement tree through a DDO store purchase or you have previously unlocked this tree for this character.

Feat.Name: Vistani Knife Fighter Tree
Feat.Description: You have access to the Vistani Knife Fighter enhancement tree through a DDO store purchase or you have previously unlocked this tree for this character.

Feat.Name: Coin Lord Finishing School Training
Feat.Description: Grants a +2 bonus to your Diplomacy and Intimidate skills.
